column5: Well my husband has been sick for almost a year. Was not able to breathe, laugh, or do any exercise...  He finally found the right specialist and now is on new medication, this has helped tremendously.... So maybe now we can get out and enjoy the outdoors do a few  activities we like to do..... Thanx for your prayers, concern it is well appreciated! Plus our computer business is booming, I am so proud of him stepping out on a limb.... He has found his niche in life and is being blessed for his hard efforts.....  Lorissa/DaisyGirl58
Good to hear things are on a better track Lorissa...I know all too well about having someone in a similar situation.
That is indeed great news!  I hope things get back on track for you and your family.
great news!!!!!  All the best!  Cheers!
Fantastic news in deed... Good luck as well
Yeah God Bless you and family Lorissa.     dsn
Looks like things are looking up Lorissa, your son is home, your husband is feeling better.  Good to hear things are doing well for you, hope they continue
That really is great news. Hope he continues in his recovery.     Don
Ahhhhh how do they say..... "Good things come to good people"  ....I mean ya gotta be some decent cat's...you are part of the OFC family~!
That is great news Lorissa!! Soounds like things have really turned around!
That's great to hear!! Hopefully he'll be back to enjoying all the things he hasn't been able to for the past year.
Glad to hear things are going well...
right on dudette!  glad to hear!

Appreciate all the support, I let my family know, they appreciate it....  thank you so much, now  lets get ready for the ice to come and do a lil ice fishing! Oh and i like the name 'DUDETTE' !!! Cute! Hey today I landed a really big supplier for our business too... Everything is falling into place now!  Lorissa

I dont know what the conditions were Lorissa.. But good news is always great to hear. Judging from the responses thus far it was much needed. So congrats on all fronts to you and yours and your new business. We all deserve a break sometimes.
Great news! The being sick deal can get old! I am nearing year 4 and it hasn`t been much fun.
